item.title: adding screenshot to map

item.dc:creator: CoD|[A]nan!ahzzZz*~
item.content:encoded:
Hello!

I just finished my first map... well almost. I'm gonna share it here when it is done completely. But I have a little problem.

I made a screenshot of my map:

http://convictionofdestiny.webs.com/screenshot.gif
http://convictionofdestiny.webs.com/screenshot.pcx

Made a pcx also (needed?) and don't know how to add it to my map =(
Can someone help me? Would be great! Thank you!


~Ava

item.title: Movers with multiple keys, stop on each.
item.author: invalid@example.com (divineStorm^)
item.dc:creator: divineStorm^
item.content:encoded:
Hello!

I'm just wondering how you make a mover which has 0+1+2+3 keys and stops in each one of them for two seconds? I've tried many ways but couldn't make it work. Figured out myself how to make all the keys work (NumKeys 4).
But I do not know how to make the mover stop in each one of them. Something like my room + mover below.
___________________
| |
|----- 3 ------|
| |
|----- 2 ------|
|...

Movers with multiple keys, stop on each.

item.title: Forced visibility, UT2004
item.author: invalid@example.com (OrionCo30)
item.dc:creator: OrionCo30
item.content:encoded: In UT2004, when you open an item's properties and go to Display, there's a setting called ForcedVisibilityZoneTag. I've been experimenting with it, with rather unhelpfull results. Does anyone know what it's meant to do and how it's supposed to work?

item.title: UT Deployable Node Locker - locked?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lungri)
item.dc:creator: Lungri
item.content:encoded: I'm using UTed3 and trying to throw down some slowfield/mine spawners from a UTDeployabeNodeLocker but in the in-editor tester, they start out locked, with no immediately visible option to change them. Anyone know how to get these working?

item.dc:creator: Eyuva 'S' NRG
item.content:encoded: I noticed that they are in some of LJ paranoids maps? I was wondering if they are custom, and/or where can I find them.

item.title: Imported music cuts off
item.author: invalid@example.com (Phloxx)
item.dc:creator: Phloxx
item.content:encoded: I've been trying to create my own music for a UT99 map. I converted mp3 to wav, then used Modplug to make s3m. After I import the file in UnrealEd's music menu, it only plays about the first 15 seconds of the song, then restarts. Any ideas?

item.title: Asking info for a couple of things...
item.author: invalid@example.com (NicolasEymerich)
item.dc:creator: NicolasEymerich
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm new here... I'm building a CtF map with a gothic-evil style (it will be my first map ever built with UEd2) for UT

I'm going to ask you some advice about these three points:
- First of all, I was trying to realize a decent effect for a kind of Burning Sphere. I tried with a custom fire texture on a volumetric brush, but the effect isn't really what I wanted to. Maybe a mesh? (but I don't know how to make one...)
- Then... there will be a column which will show "souls" crossing...

Asking info for a couple of things...

item.title: Triggered Zone Info?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ein)
item.dc:creator: Ein
item.content:encoded: I have this one level I'm building, which would do really nicely with a DM-Pressure-like effect. Basically what i'm asking is, is there a way to toggle a ZoneInfo? I managed to make a triggered one, but in this case it just turns the ZoneInfo on and leaves it on, no matter if you try to use the trigger again. Is there a way to just toggle the ZoneInfo on and off?

item.title: Music Changes throughout level
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xiphon)
item.dc:creator: Xiphon
item.content:encoded:
I know I just posted about volumes, but I got another question.

This thing I'm working on has differently themed areas, and me and my 'beta team' think it'd be wonderful to have different music tracks in each 'zone'. We know we can use triggers to turn on different music tracks, but i'm sure a file with 8 or 9 different tracks of music is going to be huge.

Is there any other convinient way to accomplish this in a map?

item.title: Triggering Volumes on and off?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xiphon)
item.dc:creator: Xiphon
item.content:encoded:
Can you trigger volumes on and off?

Is this at all possible? I was toying around with the editor today and was wondering if it could be done.

item.title: Problem reset player starts in assault
item.author: invalid@example.com (FriedChicken)
item.dc:creator: FriedChicken
item.content:encoded: Ok, I'm building my first assault map for UT2004 and the only bug that I've noticed is the player starts don't reset. Well, they do if I defend first but if I successfully attack first, the blue guys spawn at ALL OF THEM. how the hell do I fix this?

item.title: UT2003-2004 changing pickup settings for online games
item.author: invalid@example.com (OrionCo30)
item.dc:creator: OrionCo30
item.content:encoded: Ok, suppose I want to retexture a pickup item in a map, an adrenaline pill for instance. It's easy enough to do, and also to change its rotation rate, scale, the static mesh it uses, etc,. This works fine in botmatch. However, the altered items return to their default settings and appearances if you play the map online. Does anyone know of a way to make the changes appear online too?

item.title: Rain - No Rain
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xiphon)
item.dc:creator: Xiphon
item.content:encoded:
Dunno if this is basic or not, since I consider everything I know to be basic and everything I don't know to be advanced lol.

Anyway...

Lets say I've got a map where its raining outside right? And I've got a building or underground area, when you go there, its raining through the roof and looks horrible. I want to fix this.

Kantham taught me a nifty method in which you use a volume tagged NoRain, and have a weather actor also tagged as NoRain. This, however, isn't working for me at...

Rain - No Rain

item.title: NPC AI scripting
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cyrsss Female Dog)
item.dc:creator: Cyrsss Female Dog
item.content:encoded:
I have NPC's (non player characters) within a SP I am finishing and have a question about the AI (if it exists) scripting.

I need an NPC to either run left OR right at the end of a corridor depending on an outcome/Event I created.

I have tried the Action_IFCONDITION script,tried including Action_ENDSECTION,but the NPC either stops or runs one way(regarding that outcome/Event).

Is it that when they're scripted they only follow commands,zero to whatever..or can a scripted NPC be able...

NPC AI scripting
